# Contributing to gitmoji

Hello!

Thanks for contributing on [gitmoji-cmd](https://github.com/nathan818fr/gitmoji-cmd). Before implementing new features and changes, [submit an issue](https://github.com/nathan818fr/gitmoji-cmd/issues/new). We're going to talk here :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:.

## How to submit a pull request?

1. Fork [this repository](https://github.com/nathan818fr/gitmoji-cmd/issues/new).
2. Create a new branch with the feature name. (Eg: `fix-cli-input`)
3. Make your changes.
4. Commit your changes. Don't forget to add a commit title with an emoji and a description.
5. Push your changes.
6. Submit your pull request.
